sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_vasir_language_processor"> <x_snc_vasir_language_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <command>sir u -work_notes ${add_comment} -sys_id ${current_sir}</command> <display/> <encoded_query/> <keywords/> <name>Add comment</name> <need_more_info>false</need_more_info> <order>600</order> <prompt/> <regex>^add comment (.+)</regex> <regex_group>1</regex_group> <sys_created_by>martin.meduna</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-11-14 15:43:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5c2d2feadbc5cc90fd548ebe15961989</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>martin.meduna</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-11-14 17:22:56</sys_updated_on> <table_name/> <variable_name>add_comment</variable_name> </x_snc_vasir_language_processor> </record_update>
